title16: Health refers to a person in good physical, mental and social conditions. According to the definition put forward by the World Health Organization, health is not only the absence of physical disease, but also mental health, good social adaptation and morality. Sub health refers to a non healthy and non sick intermediate state in which the body shows decreased vitality and decreased adaptability to varying degrees, although there is no clear disease.

dynamic_text4: Founded in 2019, small escort is the world's leading intelligent wearable software and hardware ecological platform and smart health big data service provider. Small escort technology is also the first innovative national high-tech enterprise in China that has independently developed shopfit open sharing ecological platform and intelligent wearable platform solutions. Small chaperone is committed to building a world-leading intelligent wearable open sharing ecosystem, providing partners and consumers with more cutting-edge wearable devices, closer collaborative services, and more valuable content ecosystem. The mission of the company is to help digital healthy new life with intelligent wearable technology. Based on the self-developed intelligent wearable OS operating system, the company plans three major sectors: shopfit ecosystem, hardware ecosystem solutions and intelligent health cloud services, and works with partners to create a reliable intelligent wearable ecosystem platform to create a new experience of scientific and technological life.

appDynamic_text2: small escort not only provides wearing software and hardware
appDynamic_text3: at the same time, service and develop app solutions for more than 100 smart watch apps
appDynamic_text4: The development of smart watch app allows users to control and manage watches through app to realize many practical and convenient functions, such as dial and application management, SMS, call reminder, health detection, etc
appDynamic_text5: What can the development of smart watch app bring to users
appDynamic_text7: Smart watch + Mobile App software subverts the functions of traditional watches. In addition to supporting the functions of clock, calendar and alarm clock, it also realizes temperature and moderation detection, motion data analysis, sleep quality analysis, etc.
appDynamic_text9: You can customize the fitness plan, including fat burning plan, couple fitness, etc., and the app will accompany you to complete it. At the same time, the Smartwatch app development platform also has a community module, which can add nearby friends or third-party friends such as mobile phones, share your sports today to the circle, have sports rankings, encourage each other, and be more passionate about sports.
appDynamic_text11: Data analysis, especially your sports data. After the smart watch app is connected with the watch, the user's personal sports data will be uploaded to the app, and then the app will conduct intelligent integration and analysis to show your fitness success.
